entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Woodstock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:43 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 6:23 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

Temperature: 2.1°C

Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 94 %

Wind: W 25 km/h gust 40 km/h

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to flurries near midnight. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:53 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:53 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 6:53 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
